item.description:
"Discover Mount Auburn"--a walking tour. Mount Auburn, designated a National Historic Landmark, is one of the country's most significant designed landscapes. Here the arts of horticulture, architecture and sculpture combine with the beauty of art and nature to create a place of comfort and inspiration. This 1.5-mile walking tour will focus on the stories of history, monuments, and the lives of those buried here.

The tour is supposed to last about 1.5 hours. I have gotten the Nerd Fun group the discounted memebership price for all those who want to go. So it is only $5 instead of $10. I went there a couple weeks ago for a separate event and it really is gorgeous. With the nice weather we are supposed to have and all the rain we got, I am sure it will be great. And getting the history of the area is just an added bonus.

Please sign up for this event so that you will be on the list. They are allowing 45 people to sign up and making it first come first serve. So either go through their website or email them to register.

Website: http://www.mountaubur... (click calendar of Events -> then April 2010 -> then Register Now). You can select the member price to only pay $5 for the event.

OR

Email: friends@mountauburn.org

- John
item.name: Walking Tour of Mount Auburn
